description:
I am a simple, honest, responsible, open, sensible and a God fearing women. I have a great sense of
humor for things and i love to laugh. I am looking forward to meeting humble man here. I am here for the soul purpose of reuniting with the man of my dream because i am tired of loneliness.
when i am not working I like to do pretty much anything I'm a very easy going person,i like Music...... I listen to country and rock..... I like a lot of different movies I don't know if I really have a favorite but comedy's and action are cool. well all that i have write what i am trying to say is that, i am looking for serious relationship with principled man.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
